name: GaaLE, a Postmortem
description: GaaLE (Godot as a Level Editor) was an experimental personal project that explored the potential use of Godot engine as a level editor, rather than a full game engine. Here, I detail the development process and its effective utility, both in relation to my intended use case and broader applications.

name: A Study on Temporal EEG Interconnection
description: In this independent research project, I explore the statistics of temporal EEG signal connectivity to develop a better understanding of how different regions of the brain communicate.
